name: Asteroid++
description:
Always loved the old arcade game "Asteroid"? Try this new version of the old classic!
New features include three different types of bosses, different types of weapons with upgrades, extra health, and a small back-story.

Made during the course "02823 Introduction to Computer Game Prototyping" at the Technical University of Denmark by Nick Norman Kjeldsen, Mathias Ibsen, Camilla Strunge Nielsen, and Gudni Fannar Kristjansson.

Start playing right away by downloading the zip-folder, unzip it, and click on the "SpaceGame"-program file.
